website_summaries.verdict: Unique type of meat stick featuring different types of wild game.
pros: Good gift-giving option, as it features a random assortment of game meats, such as pheasant, buffalo, and ostrich
Sticks are mixed with some beef to provide a better flavor and to tone down the strong taste of some game meats
cons: Sets may contain duplicate types of meat sticks

customer_reviews.title: Ripped OFF
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this specifically for the exotic WILD MEAT. I got ELK, VENISON, and even BEEF!!! That is NOT WILD and EXOTIC. Was sad because this was a gift for my boys to try the different meats that the world eats.....but instead we got a handful of meats my husband, the local grocer, and the gas stations all already provide.
customer_reviews.author: Witchipoo

customer_reviews.title: All the Same flavor
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husbands Christmas stocking. All of them are Elk or venison. I didn’t get alligator or kangaroo or boar or any of the other ‘exotic’ meats that were promised. Such a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: L.D.

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Totally misleading. The most exotic stick I got was “fire” venison. No alligator, no kangaroo, nothing exotic. Pheasant isn’t exotic. I eat pheasants all the time. Very VERY VERRRRYYYY disappointed. Almost every flavor was mixed with beef, so it basically just tasted like beef with different spices. Do not buy. You might as well go buy some slim Jim’s at Walmart. T-rash with a capital GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.author: Kash

customer_reviews.title: Greattach value and fun experience
customer_reviews.text: Item is a great value, it was a gift for my husband on his business trips to Chicago. These sticks are all mixed with beef which is okay but would be awesome if some were a pork mix due to some of the more leaner animals need some extra fat in the meat sticks. Got a wonderful variety I was pleasantly suprised. I would recommend it the value is great and the sticks are a great size. Some flavors are a bit strong but they would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: KT.S

customer_reviews.title: All are mixed with beef, too
customer_reviews.text: I got my husband these as a stocking stuffer this past Christmas. He was thrilled- he likes to eat "exotic" meats, he a weirdo. He was happy to try them all out, and then we noticed they're each mixed with beef, which was kind of a bummer. He was hoping for a positive to to be only the exotic meats, so was I. But, he still enjoyed sampling them anyways. They're a but expensive, but still worth the experience I think. Overall, worth the buy for the weirdo in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Wildly Tasty
customer_reviews.text: These taste good but buyer beware of the ingredients. I was on a specific diet when I ordered these and these did not fit into that diet. They contain real sugar as well as dextrose. The flavor was wonderful though and this product was noticeably cheaper than other wild game jerky found on Amazon. If you like jerky, this product is probably worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Jaydensmom

customer_reviews.title: White and lime green mold
customer_reviews.text: Since this item is not eligible for return I will just leave a review: I have not opened the package and upon first sight one of the sticks has visible white and lime green mold. Not opening and exposing myself to the mold so will be throwing away. Amazon should allow for returns on defects such as this.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Kowalke

customer_reviews.title: Got these for my husband and dads stockings! They ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband and dads stockings! They are huge sticks! Much larger than I antipacted which is a plus. Haven’t tasted them yet but I can smell them through the packaging and it makes my mouth water!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh. It's ok but it's got beef added. Not pure exotic meat
customer_reviews.text: Hard to tell what taste like what when beef is added. If it were just pure exotic meat, that would be a whole game changer. Unfortunately it's not. Still good though. My family did enjoy. If I jnew added beef would make them all taste the same in a similar way I wouldn't have bought.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: We get it other reviewers, you hunt too much
customer_reviews.text: Every flavor I received was different and most were quite exotic by jerky standards. Some reviewers have complained about getting game you can shoot in the US, but I seriously doubt any of these jokers have actually made pheasant or alligator jerky. Grow up people. Only rogue dentists and the US royal family know the taste of endangered meats. My family immediately opened their sticks on Xmas day when they found them in their stockings. My sister was PUMPED about the maple duck. Bro in law is picky AF but couldn’t get over the taste of the alligator. A little too pricey, but still delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Mnkeysrxpensive

customer_reviews.title: Fun flavors for a beef stick lover.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pack for my husband for his birthday. He’s a big fan of jerky and jerky sticks, so I thought this would be fun for him. Every day or two, he tries a new one and has me take a bite to guess what flavor it could be. They all are tender and nicely flavored, the only issue I noticed was a lot of the sticks tasted very similar. Which is why I deducted a star. Other than that, it’s a great set. They are all labeled and packaged nicely and are definitely enjoyable for a jerky/beef stick lover.
customer_reviews.author: V Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Best Tasting Game Jerky
customer_reviews.text: We have quite a few "game" jerkey stores that have popped up around my area over the past few years, so I have really grown a taste for it. This brand, specifically, is my favorite. It has the most distinguishable flavors, without being overpowering or too gamey - like I get at some of the local shops (specifically the ones who just sell "slabs" of jerky). I've received this pack as a gift and have come back to purchase it a few times since. The taste/flavors are consistent and always fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J. Breslin

customer_reviews.title: Good Taste
customer_reviews.text: I found the jerky to taste better than the jerky sticks, that said they were still good. It is interesting to try and taste the different exotic meats. Not sure why they mix beef in with everything, I would prefer to have just the single meat so I can taste it and find out what its true flavor is like. it is also interesting to note the different textures of the meat and to see it carry over to the jerky as well. Thanks for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Boulder Roller

customer_reviews.title: They were okay.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make my husband's man bouquet. He said they tasted like a slim jim and only varied in heat on the spicy ones. It was neat to see but disappointing flavor. I was really hoping there would be some different taste with each stick/protein. I wouldn't spend the money on it again. It did make a neat gift though.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof2

customer_reviews.title: Not a good variety of exotic meat- but makes a good gift
customer_reviews.text: Makes a great gift but I was really bummed to see two plain beef sticks. i don’t mind that all of them are mixed with beef, but i bought them specifically for at least some flavor and the novelty of exotic meat. The posting lists plenty of interesting and exotic flavors and I only got 4 that weren’t plain beef, pork or venison which aren’t exotic at all to me.
customer_reviews.author: Lybi

customer_reviews.title: It's a good gift
customer_reviews.text: There were other representations that were four times the cost. If you read the ingredients i.e. ostrich, sure, ostrich is in there but I'm guessing a single bird foot probably qualifies when mixed with other more common meats. That said, it satisfied a fun gift for someone who was very appreciative and I'm sure the placebo effect will work regardless. MMM, that IS good ostrich elk venison penguin.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Sattler

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: This product deserves a zero. The item was greasy and had terrible taste and IS NOT REFUNDABLE/RETURNABLE. I recommend not buying this product as it is some of the worst jerky that I have ever tasted or tried to eat.
customer_reviews.author: mbhedge

customer_reviews.title: Great variety!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t tasted these- they are a gift. But I’m so excited about the flavors! I can’t wait to give them to my boyfriend :) Update: He’s a big jerky fan- He LOVES the flavors of these and wants more lol Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: So crazy cool! My boyfriend will love them! I wish kangaroo was one of the ones we got as the listing said this bunch included kangaroo but he will love all of them regardless! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Denielle

customer_reviews.title: A Tasty Novelty, but not good for trying different exotic meats.
customer_reviews.text: Can't differentiate each meat and this is exasperated by the relatively small amount of exotic meat in each stick with beef being the highest percentage of content in each stick. Also, for sticks with high beef content, the sticks are an expensive novelty at $2+ per stick.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Unique gift- same flavor
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my husband for Christmas. While the product itself is unique and got a nod for originality, all the flavors were about the same. Most of the exotic meats are mixed with other meats and spices so you don't get a true flavor of the exotic meat. All were good though and we had fun trying them. I still recommend for a unique gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not really a variety pack
customer_reviews.text: Got this to try different flavors with my kids. They honestly all tasted the same as I assume they just have a hint of whatever flavor it says. Little disappointed as there isn't really a selection on amazon. I did throw couple away as the flavor didnt appeal to anyone in the house
customer_reviews.author: Dima1518

customer_reviews.title: Not just beef or pure novelty
customer_reviews.text: I was initially worried that these would be mainly beef with a little of the other or that the other animals on the labels would be "just for fun". It isn't. I got a decent selection. Yeah beef is either the first or 2nd on the ingredient list but the other animal is always either first or 2nd. You can taste the difference. Overall a fun thing.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan H

customer_reviews.title: I Usually Buy the 25-Piece...
customer_reviews.text: As stated in my review title, I normally buy a couple the 25-piece set. However, with a bit less than I normally have to buys snacks this month, getting the 10-piece set was more affordable. I was glad to see that the Maple Duck, Outback Kangaroo, and Teriyaki Venison flavors were included, but I didn't receive any of the Chorizo Pork, Barbeque Boar, or the Pheasant in this batch. The flavors are all still as delicious as ever, but the overall variety of flavors received seems to suffer with fewer sticks per package. If you want more variety, I highly recommend the 25-piece set.
customer_reviews.author: Johnelle DiTonno

customer_reviews.title: Meh 😑
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was excited to see what they would tast like but they all just taste like the beef sticks you can get at the store nothing special at all for the price especially honestly not worth it
customer_reviews.author: MR & MRS Black

customer_reviews.title: I would buy them again
customer_reviews.text: We ended up with 5 not so exciting ones (like venison, buffalo) but the other 5 are really cool! (like ostrich and alligator) I bought them as a birthday present for my boyfriend and he loves them. We both think they taste pretty great and for the price, there is a lot of jerky here! Id buy these again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for gifts. Both recipients loved them with one small complaint. They said the sticks mostly tasted of beef and very little other flavor. That being said they still ate them all and enjoyed the variety of sticks. Great gifts, good sticks and quick shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong description
customer_reviews.text: Description is completely wrong! All have beef added to them, plus you do not get a variety. Multiple duplicates! Will not order again
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spiciest things I've ever eaten
customer_reviews.text: So spicy you could hardly taste the actual animal due to the spiciest spices that have ever spiced in the world of spice. Very nice, but I wish they would dial the spice back just a bit. My mouth still burns. If you're a professional spicer, you'll probably enjoy this. El infirrne!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bland and taste all the same regardless.. maybe because all are beef and something
customer_reviews.text: These all tasted very similar, except the 'mild' which was just awful. I would not recommend these sticks. Also, as others noted, you may not get all the different ones. I did not get kangaroo, but got two buffalo.
customer_reviews.author: K.H.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my fiance as sort of a novelty and we ended up splitting and trying them together!! They are very delicious. Great taste, texture, look, and options! Got no doubles, and loved all of the flavors. Should buy again just for a good snack!
customer_reviews.author: Bessie Parr

customer_reviews.title: They taste the same
customer_reviews.text: They all taste the same. Was expecting different flavors or variety. The spicy ones were really really hot. Overall they were like expensive beef jerky sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Blair Burns

customer_reviews.title: Not very good.
customer_reviews.text: They tasted weird. They had a lot of fat and bone like Pieces in them. Almost like they were trying to stretch the amount of meat they used. Not great.
customer_reviews.author: jessy

customer_reviews.title: No exotic flavors - "random assortment" is mostly beef
customer_reviews.text: Similar to the other reviews, I didn't receive any exotic flavors (like kangaroo). It was all elk or boar mixed with beef. Pretty disappointing for the price - the quality is on par with what you'd find in an airport store.
customer_reviews.author: Kate McGowan

customer_reviews.title: Go to gift for all the manly men in my life.
customer_reviews.text: This is ALWAYS a go to when I don't know what to get someone. My hunny once told me that all men strive to conquer every animal by eating it. So if you have a manly man on your hands, this is the perfect gift to satisfy that.
customer_reviews.author: Christinaz Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Still a great slim Jim even though I didn’t like some of the flavors
customer_reviews.text: Only gave a 4 on flavor because I didn’t like some of them. I’m sure someone else’s pallet would say otherwise. But I like to try things at least once to see if I’d buy again. If I can find the certain ones that I did like I would buy those again
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Crider

customer_reviews.title: Hit Jackpot !!!
customer_reviews.text: Was super excited when I ordered for a interesting date snack. N can’t wait to try each snack. When we received it we sat in bed anticipating the flavors we would receive knowing it was random. Imagine our surprise. When we realize there was one of each one in our box. It is the little things in life that make a person smile. Thank you for making a hard day feel alittle more doable. Overall quality looks and feels good. Will update more after we taste. Can’t wait to try and compare each flavor. To determine our fav
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Munchies
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my husband in his Christmas stocking. They did not last long. He loved them and said there was only one flavor that he didn’t much card for. He’s asked me to buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit as stocking stuffers
customer_reviews.text: I bought the assortment to use as stocking stuffers this past Christmas and they were a huge hit. The only one the guys said they didn't care for was the Ostrich, which went in the trash. All the other flavors were loved and the guys even took some to work to share with co-workers who have since ordered these.
customer_reviews.author: UrbanUtahTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt taste good
customer_reviews.text: Overall I was unsatisfied with the taste, I've had exotic jerky before which was amazing and thought this brand looked similar, unfortunately it's like a healthier slim jim..they all have basically the same flavor
customer_reviews.author: Mamakemple

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for a friend who is serving an LDS mission. He very much enjoyed them and shared them with friends. He said they had a great flavor and each one was different. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: nomadic_nomad

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea but not gonna buy again.
customer_reviews.text: They're all about the same. Mostly made out of beef with a small amount of whatever animal they say. They all taste the same honestly. I wouldn't buy again but it's a good gift for jerky lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra Amich

customer_reviews.title: Fun, different gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a friend who enjoys trying new foods and makes his own jerky. He was excited to try the different and uncommon flavors. The jerky tasted pretty good, with a few of the sticks tasting very spicy. He enjoyed the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Carp

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great stocking stuffer for my hunter. He enjoyed sampling some of the game we do not find near us. It went over so well, we bought another pack.
customer_reviews.author: Apothecary Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Great for any jerky lover!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son who loves jerky. I thought it would be an interesting thing for him to try all the different kinds. About 1/3 is labeled with a spicy content. There were different kinds such as duck, wild boar, alligator etc. He enjoyed them.
customer_reviews.author: CDmom5

customer_reviews.title: Tasty qualities, of course!
customer_reviews.text: Tasty for human family loves gifts! Jerky Sticks for another year old. You gift, you buy. Right? Yes sir! Rewatch it and yummy tummy. My children, who are human (not provided), had a stroke of the ball! Will reply back!
customer_reviews.author: Bingham Giamalva

customer_reviews.title: Husband approved!
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES these! The are on the skinny side, so they go quickly. He said the maple duck was the only one that he didn’t find as delicious as the others
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item received
customer_reviews.text: Received the flat beef jerky not the sticks. Bought for my son and he likes the stick not flat. Seller will not respond back to my messages.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with the fam
customer_reviews.text: My husband and my son loved receiving these in their Christmas stocking. My husband found one jerky stick the other day and he was so excited. Ha! Apparently I’m supposed to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lundberg

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for the jerky person in your life. My son hasn't tried the Kangaroo yet as that one has him scared but said the buffalo is great!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Gravelle

customer_reviews.title: Delish!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gag gift for my dad for Father’s Day. Much to my surprise, my young nephew and my dad enjoyed every flavor and animal. Definitely worth it if you have a meat eater in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and fun to try new game!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband for a stocking stuffer. He loves Jerky and I thought he might enjoy trying some different flavors with all different types of game. He enjoyed them all and most of my girls even ate some. It does help that they are all mixed with beef, but they were yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loved them gave them to him as a gift. He loved the different flavors said they were all good. I will order him more.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Burney

customer_reviews.title: It's okay beef jerky
customer_reviews.text: Fun novelty gift but they all are mixed with beef and that's all they taste like. It was cool stocking stuffer but you might as well just get regular beef jerky.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: He loved them! These sticks are longer than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 14 year old son's Christmas stocking. He loved them! These sticks are longer than I expected, which was a pleasant surprise because they're a bit pricey. They measure 9.5" long, about 3/8" diameter. Overall pleased. Knocked 1 star off for the $20 price ($2 per stick)
customer_reviews.author: JennMom

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my mom, they all tasted the same and slightly old.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Interesting but just tasted like beef variations
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in a minor craving of jerky. The flavor of each Jerky stick was unique in that none were the same. I enjoyed the Venison-Fire, Ostrich, and Pheasant. I will not purchase this again. Each jerky stick had beef as the second main ingredient. But to be honest, the beef was a powerful flavor and really took away from the unique flavors that were showcased in this variety pack.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon Salazar

customer_reviews.title: No refund policy?
customer_reviews.text: Not beef jerky but round more like a slim jim. This tasted raunchy. Never again
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Beefy
customer_reviews.text: These are not outrageous or unique flavors. They are all mixed with beef. So if you’ve had a hot dog or spicy sausage before then you’ll be in pretty familiar territory.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie Cutter

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, fun, and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to put in his stocking for Christmas. We have had a lot of fun trying the different flavors!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Stingel

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and unique
customer_reviews.text: Tasty and unique! Not something you can buy just anywhere. The ones I tried were quite tender, much more so than the well known name brand.
customer_reviews.author: Janana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for the beef jerky lover.
customer_reviews.text: Great assortment of jerky for a jerky lover as part of a gift birthday basket. Jerky was fresh, great value for the money. Gift recipient reported some were a bit strange tasting but that’s to be expected .
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Heyden

customer_reviews.title: It’s a variety... NOT all flavors
customer_reviews.text: What we received was good but disappointed we didn’t receive the elk, kangaroo, pheasant, and ostrich. Definitely read that it’s a random pick of flavors and NOT all the flavors in the picture. I was wanting to surprise my hunter with the more exotic.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Burns

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift for Christmas. The whole family loved trying all the different flavors and picking our favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan H.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this for Christmas and it was pretty great! Most of the flavors were amazing but there were a few that did not taste right. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Kiser

customer_reviews.title: Didnt like them
customer_reviews.text: They were not that good. They are all mixed with beef too.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Engel

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: I gave these jerky sticks as a stocking stuffer. They do taste great but what I didn't realize is every flavor or meat is mixed with beef. I definitely expected the sticks to be 100% 1 animal.
customer_reviews.author: Britney F.

customer_reviews.title: Approved by husband
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my husband as a surprise thank you. He loved them and ate them all in less than 12hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Made a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my husband. He loved them and enjoyed that they were different things.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Spicy
customer_reviews.text: Delicious. But a little bit too spicy for our tastes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift! Great quality and Great price
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my husband. He absolutely loves exotic jerky, and this pack did not disappoint! He has already requested that we get more, and for the price, we surely will!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Karnes

customer_reviews.title: Great unique gift
customer_reviews.text: Unique gift. I’m personally disgusted but my husband loves it. Great, crazy gift for people who aren’t familiar with game meat but express interest in hunting or different experiences.
customer_reviews.author: JasmineTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as a stocking stuffer for my husband for Christmas. As an avid hunter, he love exotic flavors and has a taste for wild game. He gobbled these up in no time!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: everything is mixed
customer_reviews.text: all the other meats are cut with beef it takes away from the flavor of the other meats
customer_reviews.author: Dominik

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Jerky!
customer_reviews.text: My guys love trying new things and jerky is always a favorite in our house. This variety is great and so far they have loved all of them.
customer_reviews.author: fittergirl495

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for a man
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for christmas gift. He liked trying the different jerkies.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie L. Whitehouse

customer_reviews.title: Great snacky gift!
customer_reviews.text: I’m using them in an advent calendar for my boyfriend and he loves them so far!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Westby

customer_reviews.title: Very yummy.
customer_reviews.text: These were really good. Everyone liked grabbing one to try. We liked them all.
customer_reviews.author: Mmnnaiv

customer_reviews.title: Christmas presents
customer_reviews.text: We got these for 2 of our Grandsons. They just loved the selection and the taste was great.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam I. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Interesting taste
customer_reviews.text: There were a few that the flavor and texture were very odd. It was too soft for jerky (in my opinion).
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Fun and tasty
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband for Valentine's Day. They're a lot of fun to try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_brings_smiles

customer_reviews.title: Ok but mixed with beef.
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the fact they are beef mixed and not 100% the animal featured. Would have been happy to pay the price if it were. 2☆
customer_reviews.author: Gre

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea - Had to buy more!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved them so much, we decided to buy another round to put with my Brother-in-law's bday gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Sauro

customer_reviews.title: I have Stockholm syndrome on a alien spaceship.
customer_reviews.text: I died when ate the boar. My son brought me back to life with the kangaroo. I jumped higher than I ever jumped in my second life. I ate the ostrich and sneezed. This isn't same dimension anymore I now have dimensia and eczema. Did not get heartburn. It's pretty good product. Life changer and good gift for newborn. My martial arts teacher tried karate chop the buck but it bucked back at her.
customer_reviews.author: Mr B Grizz

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Got this as fun sticking stuffers. Definitely different most were yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great variety
customer_reviews.text: I got a great selection in my batch. It was a fun stocking stuffer for my hubby, uncle and grandpa!
customer_reviews.author: A. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like jerky
customer_reviews.text: So these jerky’s are made using the unique meat and beef. With all the seasonings it just tastes like jerky. But how am I supposed to know what actual ostrich or alligator tastes like anyway? I don’t. Each stick does have its own flavor but definitely has that beef jerky taste.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good gifr
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for that one guy you know with a beef jerky addiction.
customer_reviews.author: chris franklin

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Sent this in a gift box to a serviceman. Always well received!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: sealed tightly and they smell good through the package so I am guessing they will ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my hubby's stocking since he loves jerky and "exotic" meats. The items came securely wrapped, sealed tightly and they smell good through the package so I am guessing they will be a hit come Christmas morning! The only way to improve this order would be if you could handpick the variety that you receive.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Great sticking stuffer, gift for your meat lover and unique.
customer_reviews.text: Was a great hit as a stocking stuffer. Unique, tasty and turned into a lively conversation and bargaining chip. Bought two sets they were so popular. Good flavor, the casing chews easily and several different flavor profiles.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: gave as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my brother and he seems to like them.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stocking stuffers
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as stocking stuffers and everyone loved them. It was very good jerkey and unique meats and flavors. They were a huge hit.
customer_reviews.author: Britain Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the variety & unique flavors. Will def buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Gidget Louise

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great item really good price tastes great he loved them
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Weird but interesting
customer_reviews.text: Weird taste didn’t like the kangaroo it made my stomach upset and left a bad after taste but love the other ones especially venison and alligator and duck
customer_reviews.author: Kristy/Micah

customer_reviews.title: I gave these away as gifts and the reports came back a success!
customer_reviews.text: My friends had fun choosing one each day to try/eat. Makes a great gift for those adventurous culinary-minded friends.
customer_reviews.author: geekgirl47

customer_reviews.title: The entire family loved them. They are a little spicy but that's ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband as a Christmas present. The entire family loved them. They are a little spicy but that's fine with us. Just know that there is a little spice there. My 3-year-old couldn't handle it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I got two otders for my two sons. They loved them. The sticks were all eaten in three days. I will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Artfart

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Mostly beef.
customer_reviews.text: Most of these contain beef as the main ingredient. Most of them tasted the same. Not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Krystyl

product_meta.title: 10 Piece Game Jerky Sticks Alligator-elk-buffalo-kangaroo-ostrich-pheasant-venison-wild Boar Variety Pack
product_meta.description: Your items will be chosen from 13 flavors of Buffalo Bob's Wild Game Meat Snacks.All Buffalo Bob's jerky contain some beef.
